title: Reapers Rise
description: This is a package of episodes 1-5 of Better Stay Dead! Contains: Better Stay Dead 1: John's ShoutBetter Stay Dead 2: First BloodBetter Stay Dead 3: Recon Mission My AssBetter Stay Dead 4: The Reapers and the PartyBetter Stay Dead 5: Guns and GrudgesOn to the next arc! Whoever survived the arc finale will have a hard time staying alive!Better Stay Dead 6: Protocol B Sideffects
author: Dave Callahan
